And he hine þa on cwerterne beheafdode. WSCp MARK 6.28 & his heafod on disce brohte & hit sealde þam mædene,
& þæt mæden hit sealde hire meder.
WSCp MARK 6.29 Ða his cnihtas þæt gehyrdon hi comon & his lic namon, & hine on byrgene ledon.
WSCp MARK 6.30 Soðlice þa ða apostolas togædere comon, hi cyddon þam hælende eall þæt hi dydon & hi lærdon.
WSCp MARK 6.31 & he sæde him,
cumað & uton gan onsundron on weste stowe, & us hwon restan;
Soðlice manega wæron þe comon & agen hwyrfdon
& fyrst næfdon þæt hi æton.
WSCp MARK 6.32 & on scype stigende, hi foron onsundran on weste stowe.
WSCp MARK 6.33 & gesawon hi farende, & hi gecneowon manega; And gangende of þam burgum þyder urnon, & him beforan comon.
WSCp MARK 6.34 And þa se hælend ðanon eode, he geseah mycele menegu,
& he gemiltsode him for þam þe hi wæron swa swa scep þe nanne hyrde nabbað,
and he ongan hi fela læran.
WSCp MARK 6.35 & þa hit mycel ylding wæs, his leorningcnihtas him to comon & cwædon,
þeos stow is weste
& tima is forð agan.
WSCp MARK 6.36 Forlæt þas menegu, þæt hi faran on gehende tunas, & him mete bicgan, þæt hi eton.
WSCp MARK 6.37 Þa cwæð he,
sylle ge him etan;
ða cwædon hi
uton gan, & mid twam hundred penegon hlafas bicgan,
& we him etan syllað.
WSCp MARK 6.38 Ða cwæð he,
hu fela hlafa hæbbe ge;
Gað & lociað;
& þa hi wiston hi cwædon,
fif hlafas & twegen fixas.
WSCp MARK 6.39 & þa bebead se hælend þæt ðæt folc sæte ofer þæt grene hig.
WSCp MARK 6.40 & hi þa sæton hundredon & fiftigon.
WSCp MARK 6.41 & fif hlafum & twam fixum onfangenum, he on heofon locode & hi bletsode, & þa hlafas bræc, & sealde his leorningcnihtum, þæt hi toforan him asetton, & twegen fixas him eallon dælde.
WSCp MARK 6.42 & hi æton þa ealle & gefyllede wurdon.
WSCp MARK 6.43 And hi namon þara hlafa & fixa lafe twelf wilian fulle.
WSCp MARK 6.44 Soðlice fif þusend manna þara etendra wæron.
WSCp MARK 6.45 Ða sona he nydde his leorningcnihtas on scyp stigan, þæt hi him beforan foron ofer þæne muþan to Bethsaida, oþ he þæt folc forlete.
WSCp MARK 6.46 And þa he hi forlet he ferde on þone munt & hine ana þar gebæd.
WSCp MARK 6.47 And þa æfen wæs þæt scyp wæs on middre sæ,
& he ana wæs on lande.
WSCp MARK 6.48 & he geseah hi on rewette swincende,
him wæs wiðerweard wind;
And on niht embe þa feorþan wæccan he com to him ofer þa sæ gangende, & wolde hi forbugan.
WSCp MARK 6.49 Þa hi hine gesawon ofer þa sæ gangende hi wendon þæt hit unfæle gast wære,
& hi clypedon.
WSCp MARK 6.50 Hi ealle hine gesawon, & wurdon gedrefede
& sona he spræc to him & cwæð,
gelyfaþ
ic hit eom,
ne þurfon ge eow ondrædan.
WSCp MARK 6.51 & he on scyp to him eode,
& se wind geswac
& hi þæs þe ma betwux him wundredon.
WSCp MARK 6.52 Ne ongeton hi be þam hlafon;
Soðlice heora heorte wæs ablend.
WSCp MARK 6.53 And þa hi ofersegledon, hi comon to Genesar, & þar wicedon.
WSCp MARK 6.54 & þa hi of scipe eodon, sona hi hine gecneowon.
WSCp MARK 6.55 And eall þæt rice befarende hi on sæccingum bæron þa untruman, þar hi hine gehyrdon.
WSCp MARK 6.56 And swa hwar swa he on wic oþþe on tunas eode, on stræton hi þa untruman ledon, & hine bædon þæt hi huru his refes fnæd æthrinon,
& swa fela swa hine æthrinon hi wurdon hale.
WSCp MARK 7.1 Þa comon to him Pharisei & sume boceras cumende fram Hierusalem.
WSCp MARK 7.2 & þa hi gesawon sume of his leorningcnihton besmitenum handum, þæt is, unþwogenum handum, etan; Hi tældon hi & cwædon.
WSCp MARK 7.3 Pharisei & ealle Iudeas ne etað buton hi hyra handa gelomlice þwean, healdende hyra yldrena gesetnessa.
WSCp MARK 7.4 & on stræte hi ne etað buton hi geþwegene beon;
& manega oþre synd þe him gesette synt, þæt is calicea frymða & ceaca & arfata & mæstlinga.
WSCp MARK 7.5 And þa axodon hine Pharisei & þa boceras,
hwi ne gað þine leorningcnihtas æfter ure yldrena gesetnysse, ac besmitenum handum hyra hlaf þicgað?
WSCp MARK 7.6 Ða andswarode he him,
wel witegod Isaias be eow licceterum swa hit awriten is,
þis folc me mid welerum wurðað;
Soðlice hyra heorte is feor fram me.
